name: Rotoscape
description:
Rotoscape is a minimalistic fast-paced action puzzle game about rotating shapes.

Rotate to survive.

Rotate the shapes. Escape the shapes. Repeat.

Many dimensions.

There are at least six we can see, and some we can't. Perhaps you'll be able to see more with time.

Unlock new characters.

Why force yourself to be a cube when you don't feel like it?

Defeat bosses!

Big mean shapes. They're ruining things. Stop them.

Complete all the challenges.

Hard mode, endless mode, boss rush, etc... it doesn't have to end if you don't want it to.

Cross-platform leaderboards.

Might require account sign-up.


Help them if you can. Please.
